description:
Komatsu`s fate is in the balance as he`s in a cook-off with Oil Artisan Wabutora that employs a giant scale and roiling flames for the chef on the losing end!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ikiru ka Shinu ka: Tenbin Death Cooking!!
Live or Die? Death in the Balance Cooking!!
生きるか死ぬか 天秤デスクッキング!!
